body_html:
It looks like the optimization level is actually the logical OR of the Boolean flags in the OptimizerOptions and the optimization level. See the code at https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/blob/master/tensorflow/core/common_runtime/graph_optimizer.cc#L27-L32

So you can get the semantics you want with something like:

opt_opts = options.config.mutable_graph_options()->mutable_optimizer_options();
opt_opts->set_opt_level(::tensorflow::OptimizerOptions::L0);
opt_opts->set_do_common_subexpression_elimination(true);
opt_opts->set_do_function_inlining(true);
